channel.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Me6Y12-sux8&list=PLz70mC333bic8uSAtRaB31CPUr6Ixi5SX&index=2 Be aware of the timer for the exam Each task has a revisit and done button for you reference. The exam system does not take these into account. Click activities > terminal to bring up a new terminal. You ssh into the lab vms from there. For vm manager activities > vm manager Ip addresses are located in config information Can also open a console from VM manager From vm manager, you can select “Rebuild node # vm” to erase and reset the vm.
